name: Xindi
body:
# Welcome to Xindi

Xindi is a completely free, open source CFML content management system that uses ORM and the [nested set model] (http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Nested_set_model).

## Features

* Password protected
* Page management
* User account management
* Text editor
* Search engine friendly urls
* Search form
* Breadcrumb trail
* Site map
* Sitemap.xml generation

## Minimum Requirements

* Adobe ColdFusion 9
* MySQL 5
tagline: Xindi is a completely free, open source CFML content management system.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
